title: Predict F1 2017's final standings!
text:
F1 in 2017: Predict the Constructors' Championship standings Last Updated: 21/03/17 6:38am Formula 1 returns this weekend with the promise of a more competitive multi-team fight for honours after an intriguing fortnight of winter testing. 
"What we've seen from Barcelona is that the margins at the front of the field have shrunk," said Mercedes chief Toto Wolff after his triple champions trailed Ferrari on the pre-season timesheets. 
So are one of Mercedes' two chief rivals, Ferrari or Red Bull, on course to dethrone the reigning champions in 2017? And which of F1's 10 teams will make the biggest improvement over 2016? 
Have your say on what the final Constructors' Championship table will look like come the end of the Abu Dhabi GP in November! Use the up and down vote buttons next to each team on the poll below to help shape the vote.
